text:
Release date
November 2024
Question asked
What does ‘type of employee’ mean for the purposes of Disclosure Requirement ESRS S1-11 Social
Protection?
ESRS Reference
ESRS S1 paragraph 75, ESRS S1 paragraph 50(b)
Key terms
Type of employee; social protection
Background
The question received was: ‘What do they mean by type of employee?’. It was reworded to the
above question for clarity.
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 219 of 278
